title: Confessions of a League player
body: Post your confessions and your league sins will be forgiven

replies.body:
Forgive me, for I have sinned... When I first played League... the first champ I bought was Vladimir, and I would only buy Life Steal items.
{{sticker:vlad-salute}}
In normals if I play a relic shield support and my ADC doesn't let me last hit to get my stacks off then I will "accidentally" last hit the kills I set up for them.

This once, actually a couple of days ago.. I died 7 times in 10 minutes to singed in toplane so I ended up being one salty ass motherf**ker and Alt F4'd ad even left discord chat. Turns out all my friends almost won that game had i been there they would've. Also Yasuo sucks.
yes he does.
you bastard xD
I let teemo live once. It's unforgivable.
That is unforgivable Talon, I thought better of you
I'm sorry ;-;
Your penance will be killing 100 teemos
been there done that 101 times
I wonder how if they'd give us a teemos killed counter. Like W 567 L 636 Teemos Killed 431
I agree
I enjoy roasting new players in bots on my smurf way too much.

I once picked gnar into teemo and shitstomped him, then raged at my jg, for giving him 18 kills in 22 mins. Turns out, it wasn't him who had fed teemo, even though the kd showed it, it was my filthy mid laner who is also my favourite duo partner (now) i raged at an almost innocent (i mean come on 18 deaths in a 30 minute game... with no kills to show) because my duo was inting just to irritate the shit out of me... 

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

I played ezreal jungle a damn lot and everyone used to tell me I was trash for doing it, even though carried most games. I kept a list of their names. When ezreal became really popular because a pro played him (with the build I use none the less) I added all of those people and told them to all look who's right now.
in the form of "bitchassmotherfuckers"
I actively enjoy playing tanks and am always happy when a tank meta rolls around
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I once died twice in 3 minutes to the enemy laner and it was the junglers fault.
whats up hashinshin

its the best strat.

die in a 1v1, tp back in and die again, " oh look my junglers farming jungle at 4 minutes into the game instead of ganking top", no loss is ever my fault
I miss critgar I just miss loading up 4 stacks then ulting  pressing q and then poof enemy gone
banned for cheating not once, not twice but thrice.

We were losing a game, constantly stuck in our base. We eventually made a break and got a couple of kills, the enemy team was still fed.
My mate yelled BARON over and over. I naturally called him an idiot and told him it was the worst call. We did it anyways, got the baron wiped the enemy team and won the game. i still believe it was the worst call
i often build sunfire on support nautilus because i don't trust my adc alot of the time.

i play a shit load of tank ekko on release (wasn't in ranked though but still)

i was preaching ardents censor for about 3months before it became meta

i have 170k points on master yi but i played at least 300k points worth in season 4 and 5 before the mastery system came out
I am a 430k yasuo main and would rather play on my second account where my mastery score isn't imaane
I once blamed my support for the reason we lost our lane... it was all me
